narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this pre-license inspection.
*   No regulated activities may be conducted until USDA license is issued. 
*   Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the animal welfare act.
*  Applicant wants to be licensed as a Class A dealer.
 
*   The facility inspection and exit briefing done on 1/13/20 were conducted with the applicant.
